name: Mine Blocks Worlds and Settings Backup
summary: An MBWB file is a backup file created by Mine Blocks, a 2D game based on Minecraft. It contains a copy of a player's Mine Blocks worlds and settings. The web and Windows versions of Mine Blocks both use MBWB files to back up and restore players' worlds.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: MBWB file open in Zanzlanz Mine Blocks
